RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAST OF THE NILE pressed the pace off the inside, lodged a bid in the two path and between horses second turn, long drive to the wire, eventually wore the pacesetter down under brisk handling to narrowly prevail. LIGHTENING MO moved up to show the way into the first turn, set a pressured pace along the inside, responded when challenged by the winner and another rival far turn, extended drive closest to the inside, proved stubborn to the end. SURREY forwardly placed while four wide into the first turn, continued to race within striking distance up the backstretch, challenged three wide and outside the winner second bend, vied upper stretch while remaining widest of the first flight, could not match strides with the top two the final furlong, far clear of the others. LA VILLANA toward the front while toward the inside into the first turn, fell back before a half, went evenly through the stretch in lacking a closing response. LAST PENALTY within striking distance while three wide, crept slightly closer into the far turn, came up empty for the drive. EASY ACES a bit restless prior to the start, broke awkwardly to spot the field several lengths, trailed far back at the end.

ENTRY.NAME: Lightening Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, responded, long drive, stubbornly

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit restless start, broke awkwardly, trailed well back

ENTRY.NAME: La Villana
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early inside, fell back, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Last of the Nile
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2p, bid btwn foes 2nd turn, long drive,wore dwn foe

ENTRY.NAME: Last Penalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance three wide, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Surrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 4w 1std turn, 3w bid 2nd, no match top two late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASHLEY'S GIRL void early foot, began to rally smartly three wide midway on the turn, angled in a bit to challenge inside the late leader, up at the wire to prevail by the slimmest of margins. PICKIN ANA GRINNIN broke outward but forwardly, stalked the pace up the backstretch well out in the strip, lodged a three wide bid through the turn, took over into the lane, clear past the furlong marker, continued to lead late, nipped at the wire, clearly second best. MARDI GRAS ALARM in the second flight early, got out through the turn to be four wide into the lane, drifted out further under a single left handed crop nearing the furlong grounds, continued to drift despite a firm right handed crop to impede JULIO CHOICE late forcing that one to steady and alter course, could not get to the top pair late. REINA ACES lacked early foot, six wide into the lane when advancing, flattened out in the late going to finish up evenly. JULIO CHOICE in the second flight turn, came five wide into the pinched and steadied when MARGI GRAS ALARM drifted out with under a furlong to run, altered course to the inside but had lost all chance. MACEE got clear out of the chute, showed the way up the backstretch and into the turn, faltered when headed by the winner into the lane. EASY ACT off a step slow, trailed most of the way, five wide into the lane, improved by passing mostly tiring rivals. MOR KISSES settled in mid pack, had little for the drive. STOP SHOP N DROP made little impact in lacking a rally. MOONLIGHTMADDY broke well pressed the leader off the inside, challenged between horses in the turn, faltered in the drive. CONTINENTAL RED broke sharp, flashed some brief speed, began to retreat before a half, stopped through the stretch to be distanced, jogged in. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE RUN THROUGH DEEP STRETCH, MARDI GRAS ALARM WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM THIRD AND PLACED FIFTH. RACE WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Mardi Gras Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, got out turn, 4w into lane, drifted out,bothered foe

ENTRY.NAME: Macee
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear out of chute, pate inside, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Ashley's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, 3w rally, inside bid, up at wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Continental Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, brief speed, stopped, distanced,jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Reina Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, circled 6w into lane, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Stop Shop N Drop
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact in lacking a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Act
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed, 5w 1/4, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Moonlightmaddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pressed off the inside, bid btwn turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Mor Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, had little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Julio Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight turn, 5w into lane, pinched, altered late

ENTRY.NAME: Pickin Ana Grinnin
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out but forward,stalked, outside bid,took over, clear,nailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 11, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11, 2023 Allo wed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SASSY BEAST vied up front while between foes for a quarter, fell back turn, moved out, rebid three wide nearing midstretch, put foe away, drew clear under steady handling. SWEET TEMPERAMENT broke alertly, narrowly showed the way into the lane, slightly larger advantage, drifted out past the furlong marker, outkicked late. BROKE FINANCING last away, trailed for three furlongs, picked off a couple of rivals while not threat to the top two. CONDESA'S HANDMAID one paced in lacking a closing response. LADY HOPPER vied up front along the inside, gave way for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Hopper
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied btwn foes, fell back turn, moved out, rebid 3w, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Broke Financing
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, picked off a couple of tiring foes,

ENTRY.NAME: Condesa's Handmaid
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked closing response

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Temperament
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, narrowly set pace 3w, led,drift 1/8, outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRIDER CHASE moved up along the inside to set the pace, vied in the run up the backstretch and into the far turn, shook clear upper stretch, maintained a daylight advantage to the wire under steady handling. BOSTON LUCILLE broke back, saved ground when lacking speed first turn, moved out into the far turn, came five wide for the drive, finished willingly to be up for the place, not a serious threat to the winner. THE GREY BEAUTY pressed the winner from the outside early, continued to battle with that one between foes until falling back a bit into the lane, chased the winner past the furlong marker, caught late for the place. MYLIES STAR broke out to bother outer rivals, raced in the second flight, saved ground into the lane, not enough in the late going for the show.l. LUCKY DEAL five wide into the first turn when off the pace, four wide onto the backstretch, three wide through the second bend, lacked a serious late kick to finish up mildly. KAITLYN'S COURT bothered at the start, void of speed in trailing for six furlongs, moved out widest for the drive, stride late down the middle of the strip to improve position. IRON BANNER in the first fight while three wide, continued to force the issue for a half and began to weaken, continued to fade down the lane. KAPPA HILL bothered at the break, four wide when lacking speed first turn, continued outside in lacking a rally. BRI bothered at the break, was straightened to race in mid pack early, faded through the lane. RESPOSADO in the second flight early toward the inside, began a steady fade before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Crider Chase
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to set pace, vied inside middle half, clear drive

ENTRY.NAME: Resposado
ENTRY.OWNER: Elite Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Menard David
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: The Grey Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, vied between foes middle half, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Boston Lucille
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, saved ground, moved out, 5w into lane, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Banner
ENTRY.COMMENT: first flight three wide, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Mylies Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, second flight, saved ground into lane, outkicked 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Kappa Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, four wide first turn, outside, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Bri
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, mid pack, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Kaitlyn's Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, void of speed, stride late midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Deal
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Mullican Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4w 1st turn, 3w 2nd, lacked serious kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 11, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOUBLE BARREL MAN outrun early off the inside, raced three wide through the turn, steered out when straightened for home, late surge to be up in time. MUCHO MARVIN in the second flight early off the inside, raced four wide into the lane, challenged on the outside nearing midstretch, took over, caught late. MINISTER'S MEDAL forwardly placed up the backstretch inside, continued to save ground turn, lodged a rail bid into the stretch, vied past the furlong marker, proved no match for the top two late. MAD GOLD broke back and outward, was straightened to race off the pace well out in the stretch, five to six wide through the turn, displayed some mild late interest to improve position a bit. QUEST FOR AVETTE broke on top, set or forced the pace for a half while off the inside, weakened the final furlong. LOVEU AND PROUDOFU lacked speed in the two path, failed to menace. B B MOODY in the second flight while racing in the three path, had little for the drive. TOOL BOX set or forced the pace for three furlongs just off the inside, caved in turning for home. PAT ME DOWN fell back to trail after the start, was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Me Down
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Loveu and Proudofu
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 2p, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Minister's Medal
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, rail bid, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Tool Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace factor for three furlongs, caved in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Double Barrel Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, 3w turn, steered out upper, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Quest for Avette
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace 3w, weakened final 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: B B Moody
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight in three path, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Marvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 4w into lane, bid, led, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Mad Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and outward, 5-6w turn, mild interest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAYOFF CYCLE cleared into the first turn toward the inside, rated in showing the way onto and up the backstretch, extended advantage second turn, enough left late to hold off the runner up. NEPHI in a bit tight at the break, settled in the second flight early off the inside, chased the winner through the final turn and into the stretch, getting to that one late while fully extended to hold the place. MY UNCLE BILLY void of speed while in the two path, moved out for the run into the far turn, four wide into the lane, rallied, brushed with SHOE TRICK past the furlong marker, late push to be gaining on the top two late. BUCK'S GLORY in the second flight in the first turn while four wide, continued one paced off the inside, lacked a closing punch. SHOETRICK lacked speed, moved a bit closer into the stretch, brushed between foes with less than a furlong remaining, went evenly to the wire afterward. APRIORITY ROCKET broke out to bother BASTI BLUE and carry that foe out, four wide first turn, three wide when moving closer three wide late in the second bend, failed to sustain that effort to the wire. BASTI BLUE carried out while bothered at the break, trailed in lacking any speed, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while never a factor. CAMEO TRICK keen and slow to settle when with the second flight first turn, was finished after a half. UNCLE JETT forwardly placed with with the second group in the first turn, began a steady retreat before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Shoetrick
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, bit closer, brush, bit tight 1/6, even late

ENTRY.NAME: My Uncle Billy
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed 2p, moved out, 4w rally, brush, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Jett
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed first turn, began to fade before a half

ENTRY.NAME: Cameo Trick
ENTRY.COMMENT: keen, slow to settle, finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: Payoff Cycle
ENTRY.OWNER: Lange I L and Credeur Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared, rated, enough left latre

ENTRY.NAME: Nephi
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tight break, 2nd flight, chased, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Buck's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 4w 1st turn, evenly drive, lacked punch

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, 4w first turn, closer 3w into lane, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Basti Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out, bothered break, passed tiring foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 11, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EASY RUNNER stalked the early leader outside, raced three wide when creeping closer through the turn, outside bid in upper stretch, took over past the furlong marker, quickly drew out on his own courage to win ridden out. HOLY BAYOU quickly sprinted clear after the start, set the pace in the two path, offered little resistance to the winner when confronted nearing midstretch, no match for that one, remained clear for the place. PESO PESADO void of speed, raced four wide through the turn when beginning to rally, continued mildly to the wire to be clear of the others, no threat to the top pair. HALF MAGIC chased the runner up from between foes for three furlongs, set down late in the turn, failed to respond. LUCAS ZIP IT settled off the pace in mid pack, three wide through the turn, also lacked a closing response. MIZSPELT within striking distance for three furlongs along the inside, gradually weakened through the lane. WIN WON DOBBS made little impact after being last away. SMOOTH RIVER fell back to trail after the start, showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Mizspelt
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Hanna James E
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early inside, gradually weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Win Won Dobbs
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, made little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: quickly clear after the start, pace 2p, no match late,clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth River
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Half Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early between foes, asked 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Lucas Zip It
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, one paced three wide

ENTRY.NAME: Peso Pesado
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w turn, mild rally, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked the leader outside, 3w turn, bid, took over, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SABERFIGHT never far back off the inside, four wide when advancing into the lane in taking over, kicked clear, held late. ZONG WAVE within striking distance outside, four to five wide turning for home allowing the winner the four path into the lane, a bit unruly past the furlong marker, regathered, late run, dug in late to prevail for the place in game fashion. KASENS TRIBE void of early foot, four to five wide turn, set down for the drive, rallied down the middle part of the strip, late bid for the place, missed. SPARKLE CITY pressed the issue early along the inside, dueled turn, weakened in the drive. GRACE'S SOLDIER broke back, moved up to mid pack outside, four wide turn, lacked a closing response in continuing one paced to the wire. SUM CHARM in mid pack and inside, continued to save some ground through the turn, had little for the drive. A. P. STYLE took up at the start, raced back well wide, five to six wide through the turn, lacked a late bid. SWEET SASSICAIA off slow while a bit green, void of speed in trailing inside, passed some tiring rivals while never a threat. SEEMYVALENTINE behind the pace while racing outside, retreated. BEAT THE DOUBLE fractious prior to the start, broke with the field, raced toward the back of the main group then faded. CAT HAIR FLYING broke on top, set the early pace in the two path, dueled turn and stopped. RACE WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, greenly, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and inside, little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle City
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dueled turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Saberfight
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, 2nd flight off rail, 4w into lane, bid,drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Cat Hair Flying
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace 2p, dueled, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Double
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastian J Ronald and Sebastian Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious prestart, broke with field, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Kasens Tribe
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4-5w turn, rallied stretch, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Zong Wave
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4-5w into lane, determined 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: took up start, raced back, 5-6w turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up to mid pack, four wide turn, even drive

ENTRY.NAME: Seemyvalentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind the pace outside, retreated
